ygData.subject: Re: An awesome adventure
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, I was on Veeshan at the time, and Brad sent out several messages about this. Kinda nice the whole server knew they were going to attempt it, and then
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, I was on Veeshan at the time, and Brad sent out several messages
about this.

Kinda nice the whole server knew they were going to attempt it, and then
that they were victorious.




At 08:31 AM 6/18/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
>Check this site:
>
>http://www.firesofheaven.org/foh/features/TheSlayingofLadyVox-Veeshan06-16-9
>9.htm
><http://www.firesofheaven.org/foh/features/TheSlayingofLadyVox-Veeshan06-16-
>99.htm>
>
>Some high level groups found a dragon's lair and organized a huge party to
>attack it. Aradune* came and watched the action as this was the first
>dragon to be found and attacked.
>
>Sylly.
>
>* Aradune is Brad McQuaid's - EQ Game Producer - super-char. RHIP I guess
><g>
